body:
I tried to install an older gcc on my arch machine for fun, and I ran into this nice problem:

```
spack install gcc@5.4.0
==> Installing gcc
==> Error: Specs gmp@6.1.1%gcc@6.2.1 arch=linux--x86_64^libsigsegv@2.10%gcc@6.2.1 arch=linux--x86_64^m4@1.4.17%gcc@6.2.1+sigsegv arch=linux--x86_64 and gmp@6.1.1%gcc@6.2.1 arch=linux-None-x86_64 have the same SHA-1 prefix!
```

You can clearly see that the os part of the triplet isn't detected properly. I have two triplets here, 'linux--x86_64' and 'linux-None-x86_64'.
title: Os or architecture for Arch is not properly detected
